title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Visitor Center for Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument NPS Photo  When visiting Hagerman Fossil Beds, we recommend you stop at the Visitor Center, located at 221 N State St, to begin your visit. There you get the latest information, see an introductory DVD, view fossils up close, and obtain helpful information about the amenities available in the area.      A mounted skeleton of the world famous Hagerman Horse, Equus simplicidens, is located in the Vistor Center for visitors to view. An NPS Photo
